item.title: EMA Changes Azithromycin Use to Combat Antibiotic Resistance
item.description: The antibiotic can no longer be used in moderate acne vulgaris, eradication of Helicobacter pylori, and prevention of exacerbations of asthma. Medscap...

item.title: Blenrep Gets European Nod to Treat Multiple Myeloma
item.description: Adding Blenrep to standard therapy prolonged progression-free survival in patients with relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma. Medscape Medical News
